span.span: Occurs when the document being navigated to has finished downloading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 巡覽的事件處理常式傳遞的執行個體類別，可提供內容資訊的導覽中，包括 Web 回應的詳細資料。Navigated event handlers are passed an instance of the class, which provides contextual information about the navigation, including Web response details. 針對最上層巡覽，只會引發此事件。This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.

summary.span: 以非同步方式，巡覽至位於指定之 的文件。

summary.span: 取得或設定主應用程式實作之 public 類別的執行個體，該執行個體可以透過指令碼從裝載的文件存取。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

value.span: ，為主應用程式實作之 類別的執行個體，該執行個體可以透過指令碼從裝載的文件存取。

span.span: The that is an instance of a class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定您想其公用屬性和方法指令碼的程式碼可以使用任何 COM 可見物件。This property can be set to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 您可以讓 COM 可見類別方式，將與。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 已設定的指令碼目前的文件所公開的物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]DOM 使用`window.external`屬性。The object that is set for scripting is exposed to the current document by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] DOM using the `window.external` property.

summary.span: 搭配選擇性快取驗證，重新載入目前頁面。

span.span: Reloads the current page with optional cache validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`noCache`是`true`，則控制重新整理，而不需快取驗證傳送"no-cache-快取 」 伺服器的標頭。If `noCache` is `true`, the control refreshes without cache validation by sending a "Pragma:no-cache" header to the server.
